review: Unit has trouble staying sync to the Wi-Fi signal unless hooked to a TV in the same room.  It's frustrating when trying to watch a movie or TV show.
author: James D. McFadden

review: We love the Fire Stick. We have one on every TV to stream Netflix & Prime.  It is so easy to use that out 5 year old uses it without any issues.
author: Saintaliaknife

review: Resolution is unacceptable. Forget HD. This is worse than the standard channels on DirecTV. The stick seems to be underpowered because it is always loading.
author: Manuel Tamara

review: easy to set up, great value. love it
author: glynn wells

review: I really enjoy what I now have access to.  I am going to get rid of my cable now.
author: Mawzga

review: Neat product.  Loving the prime shows that are available
author: tom vaiden
